dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents rivers in Iran. The Global Map Iran version 2 was developed from Digital Map 1:250000(1996).Global Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
